con:interface.name: Hackathon API
con:interface.con:description: In order to use Eurobank API, please follow the steps listed below: 1. Pick your Customer Data object from [here](https://github.com/eurobank-gr/hackathon/blob/master/all_users.csv). Alternately, you can upload mock customer data as described in `Data` operation. See this [sample file](customer_sample.json) for proper customer file format. 2. Obtain an authorization token. Use `/authorization/authorize` and `/authorization/token` endpoints for authentication code grant or just `/authorization/token` for password grant, as described in [OAuth2 section 4](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4). 3. [Feel the force](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GITb6rzpTWM) and start coding!
